titles.title: Come let's worship, let's glorify him

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come let’s praise him, let’s glorify himCome let’s bring to him all our praise, that’s what he deservesChorus:Come lets sing to him, the song that’s in our heartsThat his glory, may be seenThroughout all the earthCome let’s worship, let’s glorify himCome let’s bring to him all our praise, that what he deserves
